english.segment1: We all separate ourselves. We all turn off. Not in this world, Because today we are a disaster. So we meditate. Through our prayers.
english.segment2: Some days we fight ourselves, Some days we love our minds.
english.segment3: But there is grace. There to have us. So I'm gone away. I'm with my father
english.segment4: Some days we fight ourselves, Some days we turn off. Not in this world, Cause today we are a disaster.
